title: Fix Add Manga dialog click/overlap issues and prevent 'Actor not available' warnings

requirements.text: Fix the Add Manga dialog layout so the primary submit button remains reliably clickable after entering metadata (no overlapping/hidden layers blocking pointer events). Update the dialogâ€™s internal layout to use a stable flex column structure (header + scrollable body + footer) where only the form body scrolls and the footer remains fully interactive.

quotes: the 'add manga' seems to be floaty and non clickable after inputting all the manga metadata when adding manga. feels like it is interfering with other interfaces and are overlapping.

acceptanceCriteria: In the Add Manga dialog, after filling in fields (including cover image URL/file upload, genres, notes, etc.), the "Add Manga" button is clickable and triggers submission.
No UI element overlays the dialog footer buttons; pointer interactions on Cancel/Add Manga always work.
Only the dialog body content scrolls; the footer stays visible and does not overlap with scrollable content.

requirements.text: Eliminate the user-visible warning/error condition "Actor not available" during Add Manga by preventing submission until the backend actor is ready and providing clear, English UI feedback when the actor is still initializing. Ensure the Add Manga submit button and mutation cannot run while the actor is null/initializing.

quotes: also, i get a warning 'actor not available'.

acceptanceCriteria: Attempting to submit a new manga while the actor is still initializing does not throw or display the raw error "Actor not available".

The Add Manga submit button is disabled when the actor is not ready, and the dialog shows an English message indicating it is connecting/loading (exact wording up to implementation, but must be clear).
Once the actor becomes available, submission works without requiring a page refresh.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources must be composed, not edited).
Keep the Internet Computer backend architecture single-actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not add new manga features beyond fixing the Add Manga dialog interaction and actor readiness handling.
Do not change backend data schema or manga entry model as part of this fix unless strictly required to resolve the reported issues.
